15521221.content:
Nobody liked coming back to school on Monday. That's just a fact. After two whole days of sleeping until noon and not holding a pencil, getting up at 7:00 sharp to be ready by the first bell at 8:00 felt worse than jet lag.

School had just opened, and one by one students were arriving, stopping by their lockers and talking in the halls, some of them more groggy than others as they slowly filed their way into the classrooms to get ready for the day. However, as the front doors once again swung open as another student entered, the sound of a fairly loud burp ringing through the hallways nearest to the door cut through the morning routine.

Susie was here.

The purple dinosaur like monster trudged through the halls, conversations hushed around her as she passed. Once the other students were absolutely certain she was out of earshot, they'd resume their talks, this time in the form of conspiratorial whispers and low voiced gossip.

"She looked bigger than she did Friday, right? Like, five or ten whole pounds bigger, at least." said Monster Kid, leaning in so their companions could hear, without them having to talk too loud.

"I mean, that wouldn't be too surprising, considering she eats like a hundred pigs put together." Snowy responded. "How long do you think it'll be before she gets new clothes?" he then asked. Snowy had a point- Susie's belly had just started to lift up her shirt, exposing a bit of purple flesh, just a few weeks ago- and already it'd grown enough to lift her white shirt (which she'd probably been re-wearing for a few days) up so far it couldn't cover her belly button. Where the cloth used to end past the waistline of her torn jeans, it now didn't touch them at all, and if it weren't for her jacket then her entire midriff would've been exposed. Not to mention, because of the large orb of her stomach getting in the way, she had been walking around with the fly of her jeans unbuttoned and zipped all the way down, and still they were tight enough for a bit of her rotund rump to be peeking out from over the waistband in the back.

As Susie stomped through the hallways, her shaggy hair casting a shadow over her eyes, she spotted three particular students who were interesting to her. Catti- who she knew worked at QC's diner and had a dad who liked to cook, Jockington- who wasn't usually super interesting but might've had something good on him, and the sole human resident of her hometown, Kris- who was only standing there because apparently Jockington had roped him into a conversation. That is, before she showed up. As she went over to the trio, her large mostly exposed stomach sloshing with her steps, Kris just stood there staring with that stupid blank expression he always had- Catti looked a little offput, and Jockington looked incredibly nervous, even trying to covertly slither away.

"Where ya goin'?" Susie asked sarcastically, sidestepping so she blocked the snake's path. He gulped nervously, backing up a little as he looked up at the much larger monster, looming over him.

"Oh- uh- y'know, just....getting something, out of my locker- here-" he said, quickly reaching up with his tail, and pulling open his locker, nervously grinning and trying to keep up a cool demeanor. Susie grinned back, her sharp yellow teeth glinting as his smile faltered.

"Oh yeah? Why's that?" She asked.

"I- I was getting stuff for class, of course!" Jockington said, but as he saw Susie's nasty grin turn into a sneer, he quickly added "A-a-a-and I saw ya comin'! And since we're- I mean- since you- ahem- uh- S'cuse me- What I'm tryin' to say is I got something for you! I mean- It's a-" Susie cut off his rambling, taking another step closer.

"You got something for me, huh? What a nice thing to do." She snarled, her stomach sloshing out to hang down as she leaned in threateningly. "Well let's see it then. I sure hope it's good, if ya went through all the trouble of gettin' it special for me."

Jockington gulped, opening his mouth to respond- but faltering. Thankfully, he had a friend nearby. "I've got it." Catti's voice said, causing both Jockington and Susie to look up at her in confusion.

"...Whaddya mean "you've got it"?" Susie asked, straightening up to look at Catti, Jockington quickly slipping to hide behind his feline savior now that her attention was diverted.

"The thing. He gave it to me." Catti explained, reaching over and opening her own locker. "I put it here." She said, rifling around, before- to everyone's surprise, pulling out three bags of food. One of them was a normal brown bag, clearly packed full of someone's lunch. There was also a quite large QC's Diner doggie bag, the kind people use to bring home leftovers or something like that. It too looked full- that one at least made sense, because Catti worked there. The last one was a bit more out of place, it being a massive plastic bag, near big enough to be a bin liner- Susie and Jockington could see through the transparent plastic and tell that it was packed entirely with food. Several dozen burgers, sandwiches, candy bars, soda cans, little snack cakes and other store bought processed snacks wrapped up neatly in foil. For a moment, no one said anything.

"...uh." Susie said after a moment, the whole menacing act she was doing dropping in favor of confusion, "...Why do you have that?"

"Jockington gave me it." Catti said. "For you." Jockington looked as confused as Susie did, but when she glanced down at him, he quickly grinned and frantically nodded in agreement.

".....No but seriously- What's the real reason?" Susie reiterated.

"That's it." Catti affirmed. Susie glanced over her shoulder at Kris, who had been silently standing there the whole time- as he tended to be. He shrugged.

"...Well- I get the feeling you're bullshitting me," Susie said, turning back to Catti with a frown. But then, a smirk crept across her face, "but honestly, this much free food is gonna be plenty to cover your ass for now." Susie said, stepping forwards and snatching the bags, slinging the bin liner over her shoulder like Santa, and holding the two other bags in her free hand. "You're lucky you had this-" She said, looking down to Catti's heels at the cowering Jockington. "And you're even luckier she had it. Just remember this is a one time thing- Giving me free shit isn't some get-outta-jail-free card, it's just what you do." She said, turning and walking back down another hallway, calling over her shoulder "Bye."

The three of them watched her walk away with all the food, her oversized ass bouncing in time with her steps. Once she'd turned a corner, and they couldn't hear her stomps anymore, Jockington looked up at Catti. "Holy crap- Thank you so much Catti! You just like- totally saved my life! I swore she was gonna try and use me as a jumprope or somethin'!" This prompted a slight, very slight- smile from Catti, who responded with "Sure."

Jockington smiled, before asking "But...seriously- why did you have all that?"

"For when she came by." Catti simply said. "Just meant to give her the big one." She shrugged, looking back down at her phone and saying in her same deadpan voice, "But I panicked."

~

Soon, the first class bell rang. All the students who were still in the hallways began to move into their rooms, all of them parting and clearing an especially wide path for Susie- afraid to bump into her. She usually spent her mornings before class pushing students around, collecting lunch and lunch money and stuff. But today, with the unexpected windfall Catti'd given her- She didn't even bother doing that. Of course, there were people like Berdly, Temmie, and Noelle- who had by this point learned and accepted simply handing over their lunch willingly to her if she so much as looked at them. That meant by the time the bell rang, she was carrying seven bags of food- Six normal ones, from Berdly, Temmie, Noelle, two from Catti, and the one she'd actually brought in herself to school, plus the one massive bin liner packed with junk food and snacks, apparently intended special for her. The bin liner alone was as big as her belly, and all six other bags put together were almost equal in size when put together- Which meant she was trying to hold onto three whole bellies worth of food, only one of which was her own actual stomach. As one might imagine, this was a bit difficult.

( Here's a little reference, not taken from anyone else- created specifically for this chapter, to illustrate Susie's current size https://i.imgur.com/Tu62ldw.png )

After everyone other student, aside from her, had cleared out from the hallway, Susie decided to...
15521221.title: Susie's just a big belly- er- bully, that is.

choices: The Janitor's supply closet. Who ever goes in there? (Go to dark world?)
She decides to plant her fat ass right on a hallway floor (Stay in light world)
155212212.content:
Susie trudged through the school hallway, panting as she awkwardly heaved all seven bags of food, almost dropping some of them sometimes. Her heavy footsteps gave everyone in the halls the warning that she was coming, and so they all got to their classes quick.

Susie, lagging behind, realized that it felt a bit less noisy all of a sudden. She glanced around- sure enough, the school's halls were all vacant aside from her. It was a welcome change, less annoying nerds to get in her way and so obviously try not to stare at her.

She looked ahead again, the direction she was going. She was headed to her locker, to shove all seven bags of food in there, so she could continue the path and end up in Alphys' dumb class. What was even the lesson today? Some kinda biology?

She looked down at all the beautiful food in her arms. Especially appreciating the bin liner the size of her gut- just filled with the stuff. She sure didn't want to try and cram all this into her locker like it was a nerd who pissed her off, probably crushing and ruining it. But then that meant she'd have to carry it all into Alphys' classroom.

Unless...man she didn't wanna go to Alphys' class anyway. With a smug grin, Susie pivoted on her heel, stomping off- the renewed vigor in her gait causing her oversized and overstuffed belly to bounce around, sloshing side to side in time with the movement of her legs as she headed off to find a place to gorge herself in peace.

Eventually, she settled on...
155212212.title: Playing hooky

choices: Susie was just too full, she decided to save it for later
Susie's greed won over, and she just had to give in and eat everything
1552122122.content:
Susie walked away from the classroom, not wanting to be too close in case someone came out for some reason, to bug her while she was trying to eat. She almost went to the School Cafeteria which exists now, but she realized that there'd probably be someone in there too. And so, she figured hey- the hallway's empty except for her, and class won't be over for a while. What if she just took a seat right there to eat? Who'd be around to interrupt her then?

So that's what she did.

Stomping over to a wall, Susie dropped the bags she was lugging- She could feel her large mostly bare purple stomach coming in contact with the floor as she bent her knees and got in a sort of squat, her butt struggling to rip the backside of her jeans, to put down the six normal lunch bags- just so that whatever was inside of them wouldn't break, just in case. She grunted with effort as she got back up, before simply dropping the full bin liner next to them. It was so filled up with junk that it had plenty of padding to break its fall.

Speaking of 'plenty of padding to break its fall', Susie herself then sat down next to the bags. Instead of easing herself into a seated position, she just started to before letting herself fall with a huff of relief, her rear end slamming into the linoleum with a resounding THOOM, causing a shockwave of jiggling flab to spread across her body- the impact causing her to let out another belch. She wasn't sure whether or not anyone was able to hear that through the walls- it seemed pretty loud to her. But then again, what were they gonna do about it even if they did hear?

Licking her lips, Susie began to dig into her early lunch. She went for the large brown bag she'd brought from home herself first, as it was always the least interesting to her. First was a grilled cheese and roast beef sandwich, which she found to actually still be warm- Probably because she was eating it so relatively early in the day, instead of waiting for lunch period. Once as she was biting into it, she felt a glob of melty orange cheese drip out from between the pieces of bread- Swearing under her breath, she went to wipe it off- Before realizing it hadn't fallen onto her shirt and left a stain, like she thought it would.

Falling past her lower lip like that allowed it to land directly on her puffy second chin, which hung off her neck fat enough to have its own jiggle by now when she turned her head, being about as thick as a bike tire. She smirked, pleased to find that her shirt hadn't been messed up- And more importantly, with a swipe of her finger across her smooth purple face fat, she was able to get all the cheese off- None of it being wasted or lost, and lick it off her finger.

Actually- the way that her own double chin acted as a sort of guard, catching the warm cheese before it could hit her shirt, gave her an idea. Susie reached into her bag and pulled out a large tupperware container, accidentally tearing the brown paper of the bag due to the awkward angle which she took the 8-cup capacity plastic tub out at. Popping off the lid, the smell of the full container of lo-mein hit her. Still warm due to the tupperware keeping the heat in, it was a leftover from the last time her family just ordered some takeout, not feeling up to cooking. She knew that there was a disposable plastic fork in the bag, meant for her to use as she ate it- But she just lifted the tupperware to her lips, opening wide and tilting it upwards.

She felt a mass of oil soaked, sodium rich noodles spill into her maw, accompanied by tumbling bits of cooked broccoli, shrimp, and beef. She didn't even chew as she upended the tupperware more and more, allowing the entirety of its contents to gradually slide down her throat. Once it was empty, she carelessly dropped it next to her, letting out a sloppy belch, breath smelling like oil and salt. As she tentatively touched her fat-thickened chest, feeling her bust carefully- She grinned upon finding it was completely dry. Sure enough, any errant noodles or beef or drops of oil that fell out of her mouth as she poured the lo-mein simply landed on her double chin. She lazily wiped her face with her hand, caring less about cleanliness than simply trying to salvage any specks of food she could, licking some of the oil off of her hand and chin before moving on to the next items.

She polished off a thermos full of some nice thick, creamy chowder- simply guzzling the whole thing like a drunk at a party, before washing the whole thing down with a big packet of crisps and a bottle of soda, belching once again after chugging it all without a break. She'd finally finished her first bag, the one from home. Her belly was already showing signs of still further bloating, as she sat with it resting on the linoleum floor, creeping outwards just a bit further than it had when she started. Still, if one bag of food was enough to satiate Susie's gluttonous urges she wouldn't take so much extra from everyone. With her lips and chin still faintly messy with crisp crumbs and oil, she went for another bag.

--

And so she went on, eating her way through the stolen meals of the other students one by one in a fairly impressive binge, no one but her in the hallways to witness her ceaseless gorging, pausing only to grab the next thing or belch.

Berdley's had three ham sandwiches- he'd probably overpacked to compensate for how boring it was, Susie effortlessly downed each one in a single bite. There was also a little container of some kind of fancy ass salad with beans and apple slices in it, along with a container of macaroni and cheese, the best thing in there. Susie poured them into her maw like she did the lo-mein, letting her face fat itself catch spills, before guzzling a bottle of some kinda juice.

Temmie's was filled almost to the brim with tem flakes. Which was to be expected, but whatever- they weren't bad or anything. info.brief_description: Certain characters from the game Undertail are getting large in various ways.
info.description:
Welcome to a world of Monsters Friendly Monsters.
For those of you who haven't played or experienced the game Undertale...

DO SO NOW!!

...Have you done so? Good, then we can continue without fear of Spoilers.

This, as you may have guessed is a interactive for expanding the characters of Undertale in various ways. And in order to keep the story nice and neat, I have some rules to lay down. First, the usual ones I have in most of my interactive.

1.) No death. Unless it's essential to the plot I don't want to see characters bumped off for whatever reason. So no 'Genocide runs'.

2.) No Gore (see above) or gross depictions. I won't tolerate depictions of characters 'wallowing in their own filth' or anything similar.

3.) Hyper pregnancies are allowed but keep number of children born to a minimum. This one takes being a bit creative. For example, if a character get's pregnant with a hundred eggs they CAN be unfertilized and therefore will never hatch on their own. The eggs CAN hatch if they produce copies or clones of the original. They CAN hatch into a hundred new beings that age rapidly into adults with full knowledge needed to live. But they CANNOT be hatched as a hundred crying infants that need to be taken care of by the parents.

4.) Don't just stop a story to start another one. Whichever character you pick is the one the story follows. Others can expand as well, but the story stays focused on the main character. So for example if you follow the path with Toriel don't just switch to Undyne for several chapters for no reason.

5.) Short posts will not be tolerated. Single sentence posts will be deleted unless there is no way to expand them for multiple choices. Each post should be at least a couple paragraphs long, anybody can do that with a little effort so just try.

Now for the story specific rules.

1.) Keep all characters in character to a degree. They don't have to adhere strictly but try to keep things they would do within the realm of possibility. Don't just have a serious warrior like Undyne decide to be lazy all of a sudden without reason.

2.) Stick to timeline possibilities. As you'll see in the first decision, the story will fall into multiple timelines. What's established in one cannot just 'appear' in another. Try to keep them separate.

3.) Characters like Sans and papyrus are to be kept as is. I know I've seen creative works of Sans being expanded in some places, but both are skeletons and that's how they're depicted in the game. Don't just 'give them bodies' so they can be expanded as well or work out a way for them to grow as is. They and some other monsters are exempt from such changes though they may interact as 'NPCs' for the main characters.

4.) The human character of Frisk in some story-lines may become a monster like Asriels brother or something, but he's exempt from expansion in human form. Only the monsters are expanding in this story.
